author: Reuters Editorial
title: Euro zone economy in best ever shape: Tusk
text:
BRUSSELS (Reuters) - The euro zone’s economy is performing at its best level yet, European Council President Donald Tusk told reporters on Friday, calling for EU leaders to consider reforms.
European Council President Donald Tusk holds a news conference at a European Union leaders summit in Brussels, Belgium, March 23, 2018. REUTERS/Francois Lenoir
Slideshow (2 Images) “We are experiencing the most favorable situation since the introduction of the euro, which makes this a very good time to reflect strategically on our long-term ambitions,” Tusk told reporters following a summit with the 19 euro zone leaders.
Reporting by Jan Strupczewski, Julia Fioretti, editing by Robin Emmott
